import React from 'react';
import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom';
import Container from '@mui/material/Container';
import Typography from '@mui/material/Typography';
import Button from '@mui/material/Button';
import Grid from '@mui/material/Grid';
import Paper from '@mui/material/Paper';
import Box from '@mui/material/Box';
import GitHubIcon from '@mui/icons-material/GitHub';
import CodeIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Code';
import BugReportIcon from '@mui/icons-material/BugReport';

const HomePage = () => {
  const navigate = useNavigate();

  return (
    <Container maxWidth="lg">
      <Box sx={{ my: 4, textAlign: 'center' }}>
        <Typography variant="h2" component="h1" gutterBottom>
          Test Case Generator
        </Typography>
        <Typography variant="h5" color="text.secondary" paragraph>
          Generate comprehensive test cases for your code using AI
        </Typography>
        <Button
          variant="contained"
          size="large"
          startIcon={<GitHubIcon />}
          onClick={() => navigate('/repository')}
          sx={{ mt: 2 }}
        >
          Connect GitHub Repository
        </Button>
      </Box>

      <Grid container spacing={4} sx={{ mt: 4 }}>
        <Grid item xs={12} md={4}>
          <Paper
            elevation={2}
            sx={{
              p: 3,
              height: '100%',
              display: 'flex',
              flexDirection: 'column',
              alignItems: 'center',
              textAlign: 'center',
            }}
          >
            <GitHubIcon color="primary" sx={{ fontSize: 60, mb: 2 }} />
            <Typography variant="h5" component="h2" gutterBottom>
              GitHub Integration
            </Typography>
            <Typography variant="body1" color="text.secondary">
              Connect to your GitHub repositories, browse files, and select the code you want to test.
            </Typography>
          </Paper>
        </Grid>

        <Grid item xs={12} md={4}>
          <Paper
            elevation={2}
            sx={{
              p: 3,
              height: '100%',
              display: 'flex',
              flexDirection: 'column',
              alignItems: 'center',
              textAlign: 'center',
            }}
          >
            <CodeIcon color="primary" sx={{ fontSize: 60, mb: 2 }} />
            <Typography variant="h5" component="h2" gutterBottom>
              AI-Powered Analysis
            </Typography>
            <Typography variant="body1" color="text.secondary">
              Our AI analyzes your code and suggests comprehensive test cases tailored to your implementation.
            </Typography>
          </Paper>
        </Grid>

        <Grid item xs={12} md={4}>
          <Paper
            elevation={2}
            sx={{
              p: 3,
              height: '100%',
              display: 'flex',
              flexDirection: 'column',
              alignItems: 'center',
              textAlign: 'center',
            }}
          >
            <BugReportIcon color="primary" sx={{ fontSize: 60, mb: 2 }} />
            <Typography variant="h5" component="h2" gutterBottom>
              Test Code Generation
            </Typography>
            <Typography variant="body1" color="text.secondary">
              Generate ready-to-use test code for Jest, JUnit, Pytest, and more with a single click.
            </Typography>
          </Paper>
        </Grid>
      </Grid>

      <Box sx={{ mt: 6, mb: 4, textAlign: 'center' }}>
        <Typography variant="h4" component="h2" gutterBottom>
          How It Works
        </Typography>
        <Grid container spacing={2} sx={{ mt: 2 }}>
          <Grid item xs={12} md={4}>
            <Box sx={{ p: 2 }}>
              <Typography variant="h6" gutterBottom>
                1. Connect Repository
              </Typography>
              <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
                Enter your GitHub repository details and select the files you want to test.
              </Typography>
            </Box>
          </Grid>
          <Grid item xs={12} md={4}>
            <Box sx={{ p: 2 }}>
              <Typography variant="h6" gutterBottom>
                2. Generate Test Summaries
              </Typography>
              <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
                Our AI analyzes your code and suggests test cases that cover various scenarios.
              </Typography>
            </Box>
          </Grid>
          <Grid item xs={12} md={4}>
            <Box sx={{ p: 2 }}>
              <Typography variant="h6" gutterBottom>
                3. Create Test Code
              </Typography>
              <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
                Select a test case summary to generate complete, ready-to-use test code.
              </Typography>
            </Box>
          </Grid>
        </Grid>
        <Button
          variant="outlined"
          size="large"
          onClick={() => navigate('/repository')}
          sx={{ mt: 4 }}
        >
          Get Started
        </Button>
      </Box>
    </Container>
  );
};

export default HomePage;
